input_text:
Job Title: Project Manager - Process Piping

Location: Thousand Oaks, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Project Management

Description:
Come join the top full-mechanical contractor in the West! We work on some of the most innovative, industry-changing commercial projects in the country with a culture that is unmatched; and excellent benefits, including employee ownership! Apply today for immediate consideration!
We are seeking a driven Project Manager with expertise in Process Piping to join our team. As a crucial member of our Process Piping division, you will play a vital role in the success of our projects from the planning, organization, and management of the day-to-day operations to complete the work safely, on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. 
QualificationsMinimum 5 years of construction project management experience with expertise in Process Piping for the pharmaceutical and life science industriesThorough understanding of and ability to read P&IDs and PFDs requiredVerifiable understanding of Project Maintenance and Startup Standard Operating Procedures, and Project Schedules (sequencing of work, crew flow, etc)Proven ability of running multiple complex and profitable projects with minimal oversiteComfortable interacting with all levels of professionals, both inside and outside the organizationProficient in technical applications and software tools, including but not limited to: Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, Outlook) and Bluebeam Must be a team player and believe in our company core values of Family, Loyalty, and RespectExcellent communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills, with the capabilities of mentoring othersMust be physically agile and able to climb ladders, access, and egress trenches and/or attic spaces and/or confined spacesMust maintain a valid state driver’s license in good standing due to required travel to and from multiple project locations
No third-party candidates will be accepted. The above job description is not intended to describe in detail the multitude of tasks that may be assigned but rather to give the associate a general sense of the responsibilities and expectations of the position. As the nature of business demands change, so may the essential functions of this position. Our company is not able to offer work sponsorship for this position.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Project Manager - Process Piping
output_json.summary: Join the top full-mechanical contractor in the West, working on innovative commercial projects with unmatched culture and benefits.
output_json.travel_requirements: Required travel to and from multiple project locations
output_json.physical_requirements: Physically agile, able to climb ladders, access and egress trenches, attic spaces, and confined spaces
output_json.company_information: top full-mechanical contractor in the West
